saf.core.ui

Class SplashScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • saf.core.ui.SplashScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SplashScreen
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Implements a start up splash screen with a progress bar. The splash screen consists of an image or JPanel, an optional progress bar / status bar.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $ $Date: 2005/11/21 18:55:17 $
    Author:
    Nick Collier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
